Class PrettyPrint

java.lang.Object
Utils.PrettyPrint
public class PrettyPrint extends Object
Utility class for formatting and printing detailed information about users and projects. Provides methods to render data as ANSI-colored ASCII art cards in the console, including project availability charts and user profiles.

    prettyPrint(IUserProfile user)
    Prints the full profile of a user implementing IUserProfile.

    prettyUpdate(IUserProfile user)
    Prints options for updating an existing user profile.
    static void
    printApplicant2Room(Project p)
    Prints a single-applicant view for 2-Room only, with price and a count bar.
    static void
    printApplicant3Room(Project p)
    Prints a single-applicant view for 3-Room only, with price and a count bar.
    static void
    printApplicantMarried(Project p)
    Prints a married-applicant view, showing both room types with prices, and charts showing counts in green.
    static void
    printAvailabilityChart(Project p, boolean showPrice)
    Prints just the availability bars for both room types, scaled against each other.
    static void
    printManager(Project p)
    Prints a detailed project card for a Manager, including all project fields and availability bars in green.
    static void
    printOfficer(Project p)
    Prints a project card for an Officer, showing key fields and availability bars in yellow.

  • Method Details

    • printManager

      public static void printManager(Project p)
      Prints a detailed project card for a Manager, including all project fields and availability bars in green.
      Parameters:
      p - Project instance to render

    • printOfficer

      public static void printOfficer(Project p)
      Prints a project card for an Officer, showing key fields and availability bars in yellow.
      Parameters:
      p - Project instance to render

    • printApplicantMarried

      public static void printApplicantMarried(Project p)
      Prints a married-applicant view, showing both room types with prices, and charts showing counts in green.
      Parameters:
      p - Project instance to render

    • printApplicant2Room

      public static void printApplicant2Room(Project p)
      Prints a single-applicant view for 2-Room only, with price and a count bar.
      Parameters:
      p - Project instance to render

    • printApplicant3Room

      public static void printApplicant3Room(Project p)
      Prints a single-applicant view for 3-Room only, with price and a count bar.
      Parameters:
      p - Project instance to render

    • printAvailabilityChart

      public static void printAvailabilityChart(Project p, boolean showPrice)
      Prints just the availability bars for both room types, scaled against each other. If showPrice is true, it also appends “(@ $price)” to each line.

    • prettyPrint

      public static void prettyPrint(IUserProfile user)
      Prints the full profile of a user implementing IUserProfile. Includes name, NRIC, age, and marital status.
      Parameters:
      user - the user profile to be printed

    • prettyUpdate

      public static void prettyUpdate(IUserProfile user)
      Prints options for updating an existing user profile. Shows current values for name, age, and marital status.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose update options are being printed
